name: D'Crossier - Pennsylvania Avenue - Gordito
additionalNotes: The Pennsylvania Avenue cigar is part of the D'Crossier Presidential Collection portfolio. Isaias Santana Diaz, founder of Pure Aroma Cigars, named the cigar after his great appreciation for the United States and the opportunities he was afforded when he first came to this country. A full-bodied cigar, the Pennsylvania Avenue features a natural Habano Criollo wrapper, a Habano binder and a filler made of Brazilian and Dominican tobaccos.
